description: Colleagues and neighbours pay tribute to the three victims of Thursday's attack at Notre-Dame basilica.
title: Nice attack: 'Such friendly faces' - city in shock after murders
title_page: Nice attack: 'Such friendly faces' - city in shock after murders - BBC News
maintext: The deaths of Vincent and his two parishioners have already slipped down the headlines, as France enters a strange new kind of reality, where the most human instincts will again be disrupted, and mourning will take place behind closed doors.
